attributes.action: Ensure that the emergency costs of foot and mouth, blue tongue and related emergencies are paid out of emergency reserves and not out of normal expenditure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The effect of this petition will be to ensure that cuts of £270 million to the environment and the other normal expenses of this department are no longer needed other than the 5% affecting all departments.  The effects to the responsibilities of this department will then be mitigated.
